ygData.subject: Re: Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, if you see me about say hi to me anyway. Shalka is a lot more forgiving of necromancers than my 17th level Paladin, Kiowa. (but she s on the Veeshan
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 29 Jun 1999 12:40:39 Lavender wrote:
>From: "Lavender" <lavender@...>
>
>Hail and well met I am also on the Tunare server, but my character there is
>an Erudite Necromancer so perhaps our characters wouldn't get along so well
>:) I too live in Northern Cal although it is a college town named Chico. :)

Well, if you see me about say hi to me anyway. Shalka is a lot more forgiving of necromancers than my 17th level Paladin, Kiowa. (but she's on the Veeshan server and I don't play her a lot anymore.)

Actually, Shalka has been over in your neck of the woods fighting the cats on kerra island with some of my lower level friends. Maybe I'll see you =)

Pix
